channel.title: NPC problem
channel.description: Hello i got one problem with my npc. So it is ogre trader. i changed home location, wanted to set all npcs at my home like it should be. so i clicked on trader to view my shop Now when i do it it says - " you can only view your shops at home". Can somebody help me fix this problem? please help i am confused

item.title: NPC problem
item.dc:creator: @MR_Terror MR Terror
item.description:
@MR_Terror wrote:

[quote=“David321, post:16, topic:427130”][quote author=MR Terror link=topic=529828.msg3868481#msg3868481 date=1325170740]
he means use the search bar in the folder.
[/quote]

Lol what i should search?[/quote]
search for this: you can only view your shops at home

Read full topic

item.title: NPC problem
item.dc:creator: @David321 David321
item.description:
@David321 wrote:

sk8rdude461:

Search your folder for the text. You are using windows right? go to the search box in the top right and type that text in that says you can’t access the shop unless at home.

I dont get what you said. I was asking which file it could be because i never knew it.

Read full topic

But which file?
[/quote]
Well if you search the directory that your server is in it should show what file it is located in[/quote]

I dont have even clue where that file could be

Read full topic

item.title: NPC problem
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:8, topic:427130”][quote author=JaydenD12 link=topic=529828.msg3867624#msg3867624 date=1325117860]

Look up that text and it might be in a void where it says only can only be in home. There might be set X and Y coords for home.

It bothers me that you refer to methods as “voids”. It’s quite ambiguous, you know. This method that you’re talking about could actually return a value, and therefore it would not be a “void”.

It bothers me that you post on someones topic not helping them but only to critisize one persons statement where he possibly made a error. It always could be a void or a method.

How was I in any way criticizing you? I was simply stating that it bothers me. I posted here because, in all honesty, I was hoping that I could help you see the error you made. What you said could be confusing to some people, because, after all, it is ambiguous.
[/quote]
How do I put this. Say we were business men. And we were in a meeting and I make an error like I did above. And you come in and “correct” it. The rest of the people in the meeting would then look at me as if I had no clue what I was talking about.

I don’t see where I made an error by stating some code might be in a void. I never said it was in the void.
Explain how something I impose can confuse someone when I never said “IT IS IN A VOID”[/quote]

In that situation, I probably wouldn’t have said what I did. But, remember, this is a public forum, not a business meeting.

I guess it’s just a pet peeve of mine.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC problem
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“JaydenD12, post:7, topic:427130”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=529828.msg3867609#msg3867609 date=1325117478]

Look up that text and it might be in a void where it says only can only be in home. There might be set X and Y coords for home.

It bothers me that you refer to methods as “voids”. It’s quite ambiguous, you know. This method that you’re talking about could actually return a value, and therefore it would not be a “void”.

It bothers me that you post on someones topic not helping them but only to critisize one persons statement where he possibly made a error. It always could be a void or a method.
[/quote]

How was I in any way criticizing you? I was simply stating that it bothers me. I posted here because, in all honesty, I was hoping that I could help you see the error you made. What you said could be confusing to some people, because, after all, it is ambiguous.[/quote]
How do I put this. Say we were business men. And we were in a meeting and I make an error like I did above. And you come in and “correct” it. The rest of the people in the meeting would then look at me as if I had no clue what I was talking about.

I don’t see where I made an error by stating some code might be in a void. I never said it was in the void.
Explain how something I impose can confuse someone when I never said “IT IS IN A VOID”

Read full topic

Look up that text and it might be in a void where it says only can only be in home. There might be set X and Y coords for home.

It bothers me that you refer to methods as “voids”. It’s quite ambiguous, you know. This method that you’re talking about could actually return a value, and therefore it would not be a “void”.
[/quote]
It bothers me that you post on someones topic not helping them but only to critisize one persons statement where he possibly made a error. It always could be a void or a method.[/quote]

How was I in any way criticizing you? I was simply stating that it bothers me. I posted here because, in all honesty, I was hoping that I could help you see the error you made. What you said could be confusing to some people, because, after all, it is ambiguous.

Read full topic

It bothers me that you post on someones topic not helping them but only to criticize one persons statement where he possibly made a error. It always could be a void or a method.
Plus, I said it MIGHT be in a void.
Didn’t exactly specify that it IS in one.
